Questions: Never have I ever gone on a vacation together.
Never have I ever discussed future plans together.
Never have I ever shared a bank account with my partner.
Never have I ever fought with my partner over something trivial.
Never have I ever gone a day without talking to my partner.
Never have I ever moved in together.
Never have I ever bought matching outfits.
Never have I ever spent more than a week apart from my partner.
Never have I ever kept a secret from my partner.
Never have I ever had a serious argument with my partner.
Never have I ever discussed marriage with my partner.
Never have I ever given my partner a promise ring.
Never have I ever gotten into a fight over jealousy.
Never have I ever snooped through my partner's phone.
Never have I ever tried to make my partner jealous.
Never have I ever had a crush on someone else while in a relationship.
Never have I ever felt insecure in my relationship.
Never have I ever questioned my relationship.
Never have I ever spent the night at my partner's place.
Never have I ever told a white lie to avoid hurting my partner's feelings.
